title: Organized Retail Thefts Continue Over Thanksgiving Weekend
sub_head: A Best Buy in Minneapolis is the latest victim of a nationwide wave
body:
A string of organized retail theft continued over Thanksgiving weekend, with a Best Buy in Minneapolis becoming the latest victim of a nationwide wave.
Over the last two weeks, stores have been targeted by groups of people who smash windows, take merchandise and often resell the stolen goods online through fencing networks, according to officials.
